overview: A young biker got into a car accident and lost his leg. To return to sports, you need a good prosthesis, which costs a lot of money. Armed with a toy pistol, he is gradually robbing lonely passers-by, trying to collect the required amount. But each attack brings new challenges, and the goal is still far away. But if the gun turns out to be not a toy, but between it and the dream will be someone's life?
title: Incognito
